version_description: Fixed a bug which could cause your parking location to be lost
Fixed a bug which could cause your parking location to be lost

We’re always making changes and improvements to VanMoof. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

We’re always making changes and improvements to VanMoof app. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Bug fixes and improvements in this version include:

- Fixed the graphic circular complication icon for Apple

In this version we have updated your profile and bike page. You can now change your bike name from the app, also your frame number is visible in the app. Furthermore we have fixed a bug for riders where they couldn't pair their remote. Happy riding!

In this version we have updated your profile and bike page. You can now change your bike name from the app, also your frame number is visible in the app. Furthermore we have fixed a bug for riders where they couldn't pair their remote. Happy riding!

In this version, we've fixed an issue for users on iOS 11 and earlier who couldn't start up the app. This will be the last version of the app that supports iOS 11 and earlier. Future app versions will only support iOS 12 and iOS 13. Happy riding!

In this version, we've fixed an issue for users on iOS 11 and earlier who couldn't start up the app. This will be the last version of the app that supports iOS 11 and earlier. Future app versions will only support iOS 12 and iOS 13. Happy riding!

In this version we fixed a crash and we added extra information for the setting of the e-shifter.
Happy riding!

In this version we fixed a crash and we added extra information for the setting of the e-shifter.
Happy riding!
In this version we've simplified the speed limit settings by removing the chance to change between regions. This ensures all riders comply with local regulations.

We resolved a bug that caused sounds to be muted on your S3 or X3 after a firmware update

With this update, VanMoof S3 & X3 and Electrified S2 & X2 riders can now use the Apple Watch app to:
- Adjust motor assistance level
- Adjust light mode

You can also use the app to block your bike from automatically waking up based on
